data.text:
TDT CLASSICS

You don’t have to miss the good ol’ days, they’re right here.

TDT OLD FASHIONED

Buffalo Trace, angostura bitters, simple syrup with an orange twist. Done the Old-Fashioned way. 12

MICHAEL’S FILTHY

Nice and dirty. Olive brine, dry vermouth and Grey Goose vodka. 11

MANHATTAN

When Indy just isn’t enough for you. Angel’s Envy Rye, sweet vermouth, angostura bitters complimented by an Italian Amarena wild cherry. 12

COSMOPOLITAN

Go ahead and live out your dreams of being in Sex In the City. Three Olives citrus vodka, Pierre Ferrand dry curaçao, lime juice and cranberry. 10

FRENCH 75

Created during WW1, sure to cause WW3. Hendrick’s gin, simple syrup, lemon juice and champagne. 9

MOJITO

Ernest Hemingway’s favorite cocktail, and yours, too. Planteray artisanal white rum, mint, lime and simple syrup . 11

TITO’S ESPRESSO MARTINI

When you realize your friend’s really isn’t actually that good. Tito’s Handmade Vodka, locally sourced espresso and a whole lot of love . 10

APEROL SPRITZ

Not just for the winter, but a year-round favorite! Aperol, cranberry and lemon topped with Prosecco. 10

DISTRICT MULES

Drink around the world. 10 each

TDT SIGNATURE

Old Forrester 100, fresh cut strawberries, lime juice, angostura bitters and ginger beer.

MOSCOW

Tito’s Handmade Vodka, lime juice, angostura bitters and ginger beer.

JALISCO

Don Julio tequila, pineapple juice, lime juice and ginger beer.

KENTUCKY

Buffalo Trace bourbon, angostura bitters, lime juice and ginger beer.

CARIBBEAN

Cane Rock Jamaican spiced rum, lime juice, simple syrup and ginger beer.

COCKTAILS

THE PACEMATE

Step inside Gainbridge Fieldhouse with this refreshing cocktail. Made with Tito’s Handmade vodka, blue curaçao, mango, lemon, orange and peach schnapps. 12

CIRCLE CITY SPARKLER

Ever feel like champagne just wasn’t enough? Us, too. Enjoy effervescent Prosecco spiked with Reigncane vodka, strawberry and lemon juice. 10

THE BEE’S KNEES

The buzz around town. A cocktail featuring Miles gin, honey simply syrup and lemon juice. 10

EL JEFE

Be cool, the boss is coming. This mango jalapeño margarita rimmed with Tajin is here to show you we mean business. 11

GINGER-TINI

Spring has arrived. Enjoy ginger liqueur, Wheatly vodka, lemon juice and a hint of dry vermouth shaken and strained into a cocktail that will leave you basking in the warmth of season’s change. 12

THE DREAMSICLE

You scream., I scream, we all scream for…another round. Taste the nostalgic essence of your favorite ice cream treat with a twist: Deep Eddy orange vodka, vanilla, orange, club soda and a touch of cream. 10

TDT CLASSIC RUM RUMMER

Cruise on down to TDT and enjoy this beachin’ cocktail. Bumbu spiced Jamaican rum, Planteray artisanal white rum, Bombay blackberry gin, topped with a blend of fresh tropical fruit juices. 10
